{{Wireless embedded system |brand=ZyXEL |model=P-870H |revision=N-51b |asin=B004D16RBI |manuf_country=China |is_manuf=No |manuf=MitraStar |type=dsl modem, wireless router, |fcc_id=I88P870HN51B |fcc_date=10/21/2009 |pcb_id=45-402-000022 |flags=ADSL2+, VDSL2 |pwr_v=12 |pwr_amp=1 |pwr_conn=barrel |cpu1_brand=Broadcom |cpu1_model=BCM6368U;BCM6368UKPBG, UG0916 P22, 917984 B1; |cpu1_cspeed=300 |fla1=8 |fla1_brand=Macronix |fla1_model=MX29LV640EBTI-70G |ram1=32 |ram1_brand=Winbond |ram1_model=W9412G6IH-5 |ram1_num=2 |serial=yes,, 4-pin header,, 3.3V TTL |wi1_chip1_brand=Broadcom |wi1_chip1_model=BCM43222;BCM43222KFBG, CA0909 P10, E9801.3 R1; |wi1_802dot11_protocols=bgn |wi1_txchains=2 |wi1_rxchains=2 |wi1_sstreams=2 |eth_cpu=true |sw_cpu=true |lan_speed=100M |lan_ports=4 |802dot11_protocols=bgn |addl_chips=DSL (VDSL2/ADSL2+) AFE;Broadcom;BCM6306;BCM6306, KMLG P10, CE1125, 144720 1;1; |default_ip=192.168.1.1 |default_user=admin |default_pass=1234 |oui=C8:6C:87 |oui_eth=C8:6C:87 }} {{TagLine|802.11n Wireless VDSL2 4-port Gateway}} :[http://www.zyxel.com/products_services/p_870hn_51b.shtml Product page]
2x USB 2.0 ports (unsoldered in the main board)
==Board identifiers== * "45-402-000022", "Made in China" (top) and "BOBA B" and a ''1109'' [March 2011] date code (bottom) is silkscreened on board shown in images below. * "45-402-000022", "Made in China" (top) and "AOAB B" and a ''0928'' [July 2009] date code (bottom) is silkscreened on the FCC EUT's board. [[MitraStar]] (prev. part of [[ZyXEL]]) is the presumed manufacturer.
==Images== <gallery caption="from [[User:Americanbaseball|Americanbaseball]]"> File:ZyXEL P-870HN-51b-front2.JPG|front2 File:ZyXEL P-870HN-51b-front1.JPG|front1 File:ZyXEL P-870HN-51b-back.JPG|back2 File:ZyXEL P-870HN-51b-bottom.JPG|bottom </gallery>[[Has images::external| ]] <gallery caption="internal"> File:ZyXEL P-870HN-51b-board-serial.JPG|board File:ZyXEL P-870HN-51b-backside.JPG|backside File:ZyXEL P-870HN-51b-flash.JPG|flash </gallery>[[Has images::internal| ]]
